DataElement.preferredName: Patient Other Investigational Agent Administered Exclusion Eligibility Determination Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to a patient's eligibility based on whether or not they received other investigational agents.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Other Investigational Agent Administered Exclusion Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._In the process of being studied; experimental.  (NCI)_An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)_The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._The deliberate act of omission._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Concepts.definition: Individuals participating in the health care system for the purpose of receiving therapeutic, diagnostic, or preventive procedures.

Property.preferredName: Other Investigational Agent Administered Exclusion Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:In the process of being studied; experimental.  (NCI):An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI):The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).:The deliberate act of omission.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
In the process of being studied; experimental.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Receiving any other investiga
ReferenceDocuments.description: Receiving any other investigational agents for melanoma

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently receiving other Investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients who are receiving any other investigational agents

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients should not receive additional investigational agents or anti-cancer therapies, unless progression of disease warrants discontinuation of study treatment and commencement of alternate therapies.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient participated in a clinical trial with other investigational agents not included in this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is currently participating in or has participated in a study of an investigational systemic agent to treat MCC; or is using an investigational device within 4 weeks of the first dose of treatment

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received their last dose of any other investigational agent greater than 28 days prior to enrollment (with exception of FLT as noted in the protocol)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving another investigational agent for the treatment of cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently receiving other investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently receiving another investigational drug?
